name: bmad-copilot-adapter
description: Official prompt executor that enables BMAD-METHOD workflows to run natively inside GitHub Copilot Chat. VS Code extension (VSIX) must be built from source — not available on Marketplace.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile

chatParticipants.name: bmad
chatParticipants.description: Run BMAD-METHOD workflows, agents, and tasks inside Copilot Chat. Type /bmad then a slash-command to get started.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Show available BMAD workflows, agents, and next-step guidance.

commands.name: run
commands.description: Execute any BMAD command by name. Example: /run bmad-bmm-create-prd

commands.name: agents
commands.description: List all installed BMAD agents with persona details.

commands.name: workflows
commands.description: List all installed BMAD workflows grouped by module and phase.

commands.name: tasks
commands.description: List all installed BMAD tasks and tools.

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show BMAD installation status, detected modules, and configuration.

commands.name: install
commands.description: Run the BMAD installer in a terminal. Sets up _bmad/ and Copilot prompt files.

commands.name: update
commands.description: Rescan prompts, rebuild command map, and refresh Copilot integration.

bmad.bmadDir.description: Override path to _bmad installation directory. Leave empty for auto-detection from workspace root.

bmad.autoScan.description: Automatically scan for BMAD installation on activation.

bmad.verbose.description: Enable verbose logging to the BMAD output channel.
